[{"id":"RCW-471","entityId":"2-951","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"RCW"},{"name":"summary","value":"Extension share breaks with meta-refresh"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Pritesh Damani"},{"name":"created","value":"1568774079373"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"471"},{"name":"description","value":"

if a page has an html directive to refresh on client side, it does not work in extension.

See attached html file. This is what is sent to the server on the analyze api.

Here is an example url https://streeteasy.com/sale/1429483?utm_source=ios&utm_medium=app_share&utm_campaign=sale_listing

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Pritesh Damani"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"priitmaxx"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"priitmaxx"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1569071931605"},{"name":"resolved","value":"1569071931490"},{"name":"State","value":["Done"],"valueId":["Done"],"color":null},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Sprint 6"],"valueId":["Sprint 6"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Component","value":["App"],"valueId":["App"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"sahildeliwala","fullName":"sahildeliwala"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"scratch.html","id":"7-343","url":"https://realtycrunch.myjetbrains.com:443/youtrack/api/files/7-343?sign=MTU4MDA4MzIwMDAwMHwxLTV8Ny0zNDN8ak1Qd21pSlNWL3NWdlZ4WEtLMXFtRURSWkpnS1VHeUtmcklieU5sQ29lbz0=&updated=1568774084912"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"4-388","author":"priitmaxx","authorFullName":"Pritesh Damani","issueId":"RCW-471","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

This is hard to reproduce, I think there is a race condition on the app side. You have a setTimeout on the html. I think it could be that the page is not refresh? lets discuss this tomorrow once you have analyzed this. I would like to understand why there is a setTimeout in the INJECTED_JAVASCRIPT

@sahildeliwala
